unnormalised: Hey everyone! Return policies are so important, na? I once bought a saree from a store in Chandni Chowk, and it was completely different from the online pic! Luckily, their return policy was clear. Makes all the difference. Gotta check if they accept returns on sale items like during Diwali offers, and maybe for electronics purchased from Croma. No one wants to be stuck with a dud, especially when you could be enjoying delicious biryani instead! What are your return policy horror stories?
